TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpSessionStateBase extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public MustInherit Class HttpSessionStateBase Implements ICollection
public ref class HttpSessionStateBase abstract : System::Collections::ICollection
type HttpSessionStateBase = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 作為可存取工作階段狀態值、工作階段層級設定和生命週期管理方法之類別的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for classes that provides access to session-state values, session-level settings, and lifetime management methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是抽象類別，其中包含相同的成員類別。The class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the class. 類別可讓您建立衍生的類別，它就像是類別，但您可以自訂，而且 ASP.NET 管線外運作。The class enables you to create derived classes that are like the class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline. 當您執行單元測試時，通常會使用衍生的類別來實作自訂行為符合您要測試的案例使用的成員。When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members with customized behavior that fulfills the scenario you are testing. 類別衍生自 類別。The class derives from the class. 類別可做為包裝函式類別。The class serves as a wrapper for the class. 在執行階段，因此您通常使用的執行個體類別來呼叫的成員物件。At run time, you typically use an instance of the class to call members of the object.

span.span: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.

Always.

Always.

Always.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得或設定工作階段狀態提供者結束工作階段之前，要求之間可經過的時間 (以分鐘為單位)。

Always.
